title: Rocket Report: Space Force to pick three; Pythom strikes back
summary: "With this mission we’ve made big strides toward reusability."

title: NASA moving into next phase of exploration architecture review
summary: Three months after rolling out the first phase of its architecture for human exploration of the moon and Mars, NASA is heading into a second phase that will focus on Mars.

title: Pew Poll: Americans Want Space Program to Focus on Asteroids and Climate More Than Human Spaceflight
summary: The latest poll from the Pew Research Center once again found that by a wide margin Americans want the space program to focus more on the threat from asteroids and […]

title: Booster 9 rolls to the upgraded Starbase pad ahead of Static Fire test
summary: Booster 9 has arrived at the Orbital Launch Site ahead of a Static Fire test, which will also be used to validate repairs and upgrades of Starship’s launch pad. That rollout is a key milestone in the campaign ahead of the second flight of the world’s most powerful rocket.

title: NASA, White House Advance Historically Black Scholar Recognition
summary: NASA and the Department of Education, in support of STEM and diversity, equity, inclusion, and accessibility initiatives, are hosting a competition to engage students at HBCUs (Historically Black Colleges and Universities), ultimately bringing diverse talent into the future science, technology, engineering, and mathematics pipeline.

title: NASA Awards Integrated Mission Operations Contract III
summary: NASA has selected KBR Wyle Services, LLC, of Fulton, Maryland, to provide mission and flight crew operations support for the International Space Station and future human space exploration.

title: Space Force using Anduril software to integrate U.S. space surveillance sensors
summary: WASHINGTON — The Space Force is using a software platform developed by Anduril Industries to integrate data from a decades-old network of space surveillance sensors.  DoD announced July 12 that […]

title: Canoo delivers three Crew Transportation Vehicles to NASA
summary: Canoo (NASDAQ: GOEV) has delivered three specialized versions of their Lifestyle electric vehicle to NASA’s Kennedy Space Center. The Crew Transportation Vehicles...

title: ESA’s Space Rider Spacecraft Reaches Key Milestone
summary:
On June 20, the Space Rider programme proceeded into Phase D of its development, allowing qualification and production to commence. While delivery of the main structures of the re-entry and service modules is only expected in 2024, flight units of some components are already complete. “Some flight units and components have already been delivered and […]
The post ESA’s Space Rider Spacecraft Reaches Key Milestone appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: NASA's Perseverance Rover Sees Mars in a New Light
summary: A cutting-edge instrument called SHERLOC, which hunts for molecules potentially related to ancient life, played a key role in a recent study.
